summary: This testimony before the Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship discusses the Small Business Administration's management of fraud risks and ways it can improve its estimates of improper payments and oversight of its contracting programs. It is based on the following reports, among others: COVID-19 Relief: Improved Controls Needed for Referring Likely Fraud in SBA's Pandemic Loan Programs COVID-19 Relief: SBA and DOL Should...
title: Small Business Administration: Opportunities to Improve Management of Fraud Risks, Improper Payments, and Contracting Programs
